title: 10: OBITCH Welcome to the Moulin Rouge
description:
Hello Funeral Clowns and Funeral Strippers alike, this week we’ve got a little rundown on cremations, a suspicious mannequin, some obituaries that keep it real, and of course, some dumb.ass.criminalssss, let’s do it! 
Follow us: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com 
Sponsors: 
BetterHelp: Visit betterhelp.com/obit for ten percent off! 
Hello Fresh: Visit hellofresh.com/obit14 and use code ‘obit14’ for up to 14 free meals + free shipping!
Wicked Clothes: Visit wickedclothes.com/obit for ten percent off! 
Sources: 
https://random-times.com/2019/10/21/la-pascualita-the-mystery-of-the-corpse-bride-exhibited-in-a-shop-window-in-mexico/
https://www.riverfronttimes.com/newsblog/2021/08/13/wild-elizabeth-cooke-saga-grips-internet-sleuths-in-st-louis-and-beyond https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/us/elizabeth-cooke-bobby-phillips-and-the-st-louis-internet-crime-story-sweeping-the-country/ar-AANjVV8

https://legacyheadstones.com/blog/twelve-facts-about-cremation/

https://www.honanfh.com/history-of-cremation
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lake_Mungo_remains
